content: p6 repeat to last 2 stitches k2 rm slip last 2 stitches back to left needle pm round 11 c4b p6 repeat to end of round rounds 12-14 k4 p6 repeat to end of round round 15 c4b p6 repeat to end of round round 16 k4 p6 repeat to end of round round 17 rm k2 pm cr3f p4 cr3b repeat to end of round round 18 p1 k2 p4 k2 p2 repeat to last 9 stitches k2 p4 k2 p1 round 19 p1 cr3f p2 cr3b p2 repeat to last 9 stitches cr3f p2 cr3b p1 round 20 p2 k2 p2 k2 p4 repeat to last 8 stitches k2 p2 2 round 21 p2 cr3f cr3b p4 repeat to last 8 stitches cr3f cr3b p2 round 22 p3 k4 p6 repeat to last 7 stitches k4 p3 round 23 p3 c4b p6 repeat to last 7 stitches c4b p3 round 24 p3 k4 p6 repeat to last 7 stitches k4 p3 repeat the 24 row cable pattern once more repeat row 1 and 2 once more purl one row change to smaller needles and commence top rib k1 p2 k2 repeat to last 3 stitches p2 k1 repeat last row 8 times cast off in rib weave in ends and your cowl is ready to wear
